paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the third order difference equation y(n+1) = alpha y(n-2)/beta + gamma y(n)(k)y(n-1)(k)y(n-2)(k) , n = 0, 1, 2, ... where the initial conditions y(-2), y(-1), y(0) and the parameters alpha, beta and gamma are positive real numbers and k >= 2 is a fixed integer. We investigate the stability, the periodic character and the boundedness nature of solutions of the above mentioned difference equation. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Stability and periodic character of a third order difference equation
